name: zama-service-status-monitor-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Zama Service Status Monitor package and examples

scripts.dev: pnpm --filter core dev & pnpm --filter example dev
scripts.build: pnpm --filter core build && pnpm --filter example build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter core clean && pnpm --filter example clean
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter core typecheck && pnpm --filter example typecheck

author: Zama
